name: HydraBuster
description:
You are the HydraBuster. You must kill the Hydra. The Hydra will regrow. The cycle will continue.

Fight waves of enemies that grow stronger overtime. Purchase upgrades to increase in power.  Defeat the Hydra and its protectors. Continue the loop and increase the difficulty. Choose from over a dozen modifiers to change the game.

This game uses both keyboard and mouse.
